name: Broken World (Imixari)
description:
A (possibly evil) wizard has destroyed the whole world, plunging in into chaos! The goal is to survive for as long as you can and get the most points.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Stuff I used:

  • Pixel Adventure by Pixel Frog: https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1
  • Gravity Pixel Font Pack: https://jotson.itch.io/gravity-pixel-font
  • Silentwolf (for the leaderboard): https://silentwolf.com/
  • The Godot Engine
